description:
The cooking game Overcooked is getting adapted into a competition reality series for Netflix, according to a new report. The production company A24 has bought the rights to the game and is working with Netflix on an unscripted show, Deadline reported.

The show is said to be similar to other Netflix competition series such as Nailed It and Floor Is Lava. "Overcooked aims to serve up high-stakes kitchen challenges and the signature chaos that made the video game a hit with fans," the report said.

The series is said to be in the "early stages" of development, with multiple developers from Ghost Town Games signed on to be executive producers.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Overcooked Reality Competition Show Coming To Netflix - Report
Get Batman '89 Sequel Novel For Nearly 50% Off At Amazon

description: It's exceedingly rare for an annual sports game to skip an entire year, but that's exactly what developer Sports Interactive did when it canceled Football Manager 25. With so many changes--including switching game engines to Unity--and numerous delays, the game simply wasn't up to standard in time. Couple this unforeseen gap year with the promise of a brand-new foundation built on an improved match engine and a completely overhauled interface, and Football Manager 26 quickly became the most highly anticipated game in the long-running series. Unfortunately, the end result is a cliched game of two halves. While the match engine is as impressive as advertised, the UI debuts with significant teething problems. Throw in some missing features and a multitude of frustrating bugs, and FM 26 would be disappointing even if expectations weren't so high.
title: Football Manager 26 Review - Back To The Drawing Board

description:
You spend a lot of time in Arc Raiders seeking out a variety of items topside to help Speranza thrive down below. One quest called Root of the Matter tasks you with visiting the Research Building to find a seed vault. If you've arrived in the building and want to know where to find the seed vault, we'll cover the bases for you in this guide.

Note that you won't need to extract to complete this quest. Because of this--and given how dangerous the Research Building and surrounding areas can be to explore--we'd recommend bringing a free loadout unless you're feeling particularly confident in your survival skills.

When you're ready to find the seed vault and wrap up Root of the Matter, follow the steps below.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Arc Raiders Root Of The Matter Quest Guide

description:
Discord servers rejoice: Peak has just gotten a new major update called The Roots. The multiplayer climbing game from Aggro Crab and Landfall is introducing another biome into the existing roster, and its theme is quite terrifying.

Available today, The Roots might seem similar to Tropics at first glance, but it's got a totally different vibe. Think of it more like a forest than a jungle, packed with its own enemies, traps, and weather hazards. In addition, you can also expect an assortment of fresh items to play with and totally not ruin your current run with friends.

From new edible mushrooms with mysterious properties to scary bugs and occult items, there's a lot to unpack. Before you schedule a time and date with the group chat, make sure to check out what's new in Peak with The Roots update below,
title: Everything New In Peak The Roots Update - Full Patch Notes

description:
Arc Raiders has a multi-quest storyline based around contaminated water, and it all starts with the Water Troubles quest. This quest sends you to the Dam Battlegrounds to collect a water sample--but if you don't know where to do so, it can be a bit confusing to figure out. We'll reduce the frustration for you a bit by explaining how to get the water sample.

You won't need to extract to complete this quest, so feel free to jump in with a free loadout if you prefer. This will ensure that you won't lose anything important if you happen to run into trouble while exploring the Dam Battlegrounds.

When you're ready to set off, here's how to complete Water Troubles.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Arc Raiders Water Troubles Quest Guide

description: Peak's newest biome is finally here. A flurry of new badges is also available, greatly expanding the number of cosmetics you can use to decorate your scout. The Roots update adds 11 new badges to the hiking hit.
title: All the New Peak Badges In The Roots Biome

description:
In 2010, Visceral Games and Electronic Arts unleashed Dante's Inferno, an action-adventure game that was their answer to God of War. The story was very loosely inspired by Dante Alighieri's classic text, The Divine Comedy, as Dante sought to retrieve the soul of his wife, Beatrice, from Hell while facing Lucifer and the forces of evil. Now, 15 years after the game's release, new details have emerged about the canceled sequel, Dante's Inferno 2: Purgatorio.

IGN has an extensive report about Purgatorio, which includes a comprehensive breakdown of the story. The follow-up was envisioned as the inverse of the first game, as Dante was meant to scale Mount Purgatory to reunite with Beatrice and reach the Garden of Eden on top. However, each layer of the mountain represented one of the Seven Deadly Sins, and Dante
title: Dante's Inferno Sequel Would Have Taken Its Hero Through A War In Purgatory
Mass Effect: Priority Hagalaz Board Game Gets Limited-Time Discount

description:
As part of Nintendo's latest earnings report, the company disclosed plans for the original Switch now that the Switch 2 is in the market and putting up big sales numbers. The original Switch will continue to be sold, Nintendo confirmed, but the company will focus on the Switch 2 going ahead.

"While our business focus will shift to Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch has maintained a steady sales pace even after the June launch of its successor. While taking consumer demand and the business environment into consideration, we will continue sales of Nintendo Switch hardware," Nintendo said.

In total, Nintendo has sold 154.01 million Switch consoles worldwide through September 30, and that's
title: Original Switch Will Not Be Removed From Sale, But Nintendo Will Focus On Switch 2 Going Forward

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 releases on November 14, and Treyarch has released more information about the multiplayer content players can expect at launch. This includes the full list of multiplayer maps, game modes, and operators available in Black Ops 7 before the launch of Season 1.

For maps, Black Ops 7 launches with 18 multiplayer maps. This list consists of 16 core 6v6 maps, while the additional two are large-scale 20v20 maps designed for Black Ops 7's new Skirmish mode. Most of the maps are brand new, but the game does include a few popular remasters from Black Ops 2. The full list of launch maps can be seen below.

Black Ops 7 launch maps:

  • Blackheart
  • Cortex
  • Exposure
  • Imprint
  • The Forge
  • Toshin
  • Colossus
  • Den
  • Flagship
title: Here's Everything Coming To CoD: Black Ops 7 Multiplayer At Launch

description:
Arc Raiders has a surprisingly touching story underneath all of the fun shooting and looting. At some point, Celeste will request that you visit a location and pay respects to a fallen soldier by placing a helmet on a memorial pole as part of the Keeping the Memory quest. For this sad but easy quest, you'll need to visit the Wreckage on the Dam Battlegrounds map and complete the quick task. If you're having some trouble finding the helmet, though, we've got you covered.

Note that you won't need to extract anything to complete this quest, so you can load in with a free loadout to reduce any concerns about losing your precious resources. When you're ready to set out, read on for where to find the helmet for Keeping the Memory.

Where to find and place the helmet for Keeping the Memory

To find the helmet, you'll need to head to the Wreckage on the southern portion of the Dam Battlegrounds map. This can someti
title: Arc Raiders Keeping The Memory Quest Guide

description:
No one likes contaminated water, so it's best you fix things up when you find out the water supply is tainted in Arc Raiders. The Source of the Contamination quest asks you to figure out what's causing the issue--and while it may seem pretty simple at a glance, it can be a little tricky to figure out the exact spot where things are going wrong with the water. Below, we'll fill you in on where to find the Flood Spill Intake on the Dam Battlegrounds map and how to solve this mystery.

Be aware that you don't need to extract with any items during this quest. Since you'll merely need to visit the location below and interact with an item, it's not a bad idea to handle things with a free loadout so you're not risking any of your hard-earned resources while exploring here.

Where to find the Flood Spill Intake at the Water Treatment Center

The Water Treatment Center is found just to the left of the middle of the D
title: Arc Raiders Source of the Contamination Quest Guide

description:
Obsidian Entertainments are masters of the open-world RPG and, among the developer's many achievements, is an outstanding history of creating compelling and memorable characters. If you've played The Outer Worlds, you'll no doubt be able to attest to this, as the sci-fi RPG is packed to bursting point with interesting and nuanced figures you'll encounter on your adventures and will stick with you long after you've stopped playing.

In the lead-up to the release of The Outer Worlds 2, we asked GameSpot fans on Instagram to take a space-walk down memory lane and vote for who their favorite characters from the original game are and, unsurprisingly, there as a big selection of characters that got a lot of love. We put together a list of the top three most-popular characters according to percentage of votes for them. So, let's join those fans on their reminiscing and reflect back on the characters that have proved most popular, as we get excited to meet more in
title: Most Popular The Outer Worlds Characters As Voted By You!

description:
Quests in Arc Raiders send you topside with a variety of mission types, but if you've completed outings like Marked for Death and Market Correction for Tian Wen, you know she's often asking you to check out caches. That trend continues in Industrial Espionage, which tasks you with delivering a gun to a weapon cache. If you're struggling to figure this one out, don't fret--here's how to complete the Industrial Espionage quest in Arc Raiders.

Where to take the gun in the Industrial Espionage quest

Important: Tian Wen will provide you with a Burletta gun when accepting Industrial Espionage. You are required to bring this weapon with you into the Buried City to complete the quest. If you happen
title: Arc Raiders Industrial Espionage Quest Guide

description:
Something is gross about the water around here, and it's time to fix it. One of the quests you'll receive in Arc Raiders asks you to head into the Spaceport tunnels and turn a valve to switch up the water supply. Switching the Supply is a relatively straightforward quest, but the valve you need to interact with can be surprisingly challenging to spot if you're not quite sure where to look. That's what we're here for, though, so we'll tell you how to complete the Switching the Supply quest in Arc Raiders.

Before heading off, however, keep in mind that you won't need to extract with anything to complete this quest. So, you can bring in a free loadout just in case things don't go as you're planning. Spaceport is an active and dangerous map after all, so it's best not to take any unnecessary chances.

With that out of the way, let's switch the supply.
title: Arc Raiders Switching The Supply Quest Guide
How Lego Designed Its Authentic Nintendo Game Boy Model

description:
Arc Raiders sends you on plenty of item retrieval or combat missions, but one quest you'll encounter simply asks you to raise a flag for the sake of unity. If you've obtained the A Symbol of Unification quest, you'll be ready to get out there and start bringing folks together. Luckily, we're here to help you do so with an explanation of where to find the flag and how to raise it. Let's dive in.

Where to find the flag for the A Symbol of Unification quest

Where you're headed to complete A Symbol of Unification isn't typically overflowing with other players--but the areas you may need to pass through--such as the Wreckage and Scrap Yard--could be, as they're common spots for mushroom farming. With this in mind, just be sure to prepare accordingly. You don't need to extract to complete this quest, so it's not a bad idea to toss on a free loadout while working on it just in case you run into trouble and don't make
title: Arc Raiders A Symbol Of Unification Quest Guide

description:
Arc Raiders is filled with quests that require you to get things back up and running topside to help those down below get prepared to take the world back from the ARC. One such quest called Straight Record comes from Celeste, who sends you topside in the Dam Battlegrounds to turn on an old EMP. This task will require you to not only find the old EMP but also turn on multiple switches to get it going again--so if you're struggling to find them, we've got you covered. Here's how to complete the Straight Record quest in Arc Raiders.

Where to find the old EMP trap for the Straight Record quest

Completing the Straight Record quest does not require you to extract. As such, feel free to spawn into the raid using a free loadout to avoid any loss of resources in the event that you perish from enemies or other players while trying to get it finished.

Your first goal in Straight Record is to find the old EMP trap in
title: Arc Raiders Straight Record Quest Guide

description:
Most quests in Arc Raiders send you to complete a couple of tasks on any given map, but a few quests require you to traverse long distances to clear multiple requirements. Perhaps the most substantial of these is A First Foothold, which asks you to visit four locations across Blue Gate. Each of these is on a completely different side of the map (north, east, south, west). It's a lengthy quest that may prove dangerous, but we're here to help you figure it out.

Luckily, you won't need to visit all of these locations in a single raid, meaning you can always knock out the tasks across multiple visits if you prefer. You also don't need to extract for any of them to count, so feel free to handle this with a free loadout that you don't mind losing if things get hairy.

Here's how to finish all four requirements to complete A First Foothold.
title: Arc Raiders A First Foothold Quest Guide

description:
Blizard has announced the official dates for when tickets will go on sale for BlizzCon next year, when it returns to the Anaheim Convention Center in September 2026. Early-Bird tickets will go on sale starting November 7 at 9 AM PT / 12 PM ET, and are priced at $250 for both days of the fan expo. This includes taxes and fees, and it comes with commemorative in-game items as a bonus.

These tickets will be sold while supplies last, after which, Blizzard will sell a standard ticket weekend pass for $290 starting November 18. This is $10 cheaper than the standard tickets sold for BlizzCon 2023, and it also offers full two-day weekend admission to BlizzCon on both Saturday and Sunday.

Fans looking to upgrade their experience can purchase a $500 ticket to BlizzCon Charity Night, an exclusive event with Blizzard developers, artists, and
title: BlizzCon 2026 Tickets Go On Sale Soon--Here’s How Much They’ll Cost

description:
AI-controlled bots have become a significant part of online multiplayer games. You can find them in titles like Fortnite, Mecha Break, Marvel Rivals, and, most recently, Battlefield 6. Players have made it clear that facing too many bots often isn’t fun--and not the reason they play multiplayer games in the first place. A Battlefield 6 producer has now responded to that feedback.

“Bots enter the game on regular playlists only under these conditions: Players kickstart a lobby for a playlist, and the pre-round takes longer than X minutes (I believe three minutes),” said Battlefield lead producer David Sirland in a post. “At that point, the bots fill the server to the necessary limit to start the game.”
title: Without Battlefield 6 Bots, You'd Be Waiting A Lot Longer, Producer Says

description:
Battlefield 6 has mostly been a hit since its launch early in October, but chief among its players' concerns have been its arduous challenges. Fortunately, Battlefield Studios has been tracking the conversations regarding these tasks, as well as weapon- and mode-specific assignments, and is rolling out changes to streamline them.

Announced on November 5, Battlefield 6 is receiving a significant overhaul to challenges, one which drastically shortens the vast majority of their requirements to "make them more achievable within a reasonable session length."

As an example, Battlefield Studios cites how it has reduced the amount of required revives for a Support class challenge from 200 to 60. An example of of a streamlined weapon assignment showed that players would only need to inflict 3,000 damage as opposed to the previous requirement
title: Battlefield 6's Challenges Have Become Signiciantly Easier To Complete

description:
The Nintendo Switch 2 has sold more than 10 million units through September 30, representing the most successful launch of a new platform in Nintendo's history after the first four months. Given this, it's little surprise that Nintendo also disclosed in a recent earnings announcement that demand for the Switch 2 exceeded Nintendo's internal expectations.

The company apologized to people who were not able to get a Switch 2 right away due to shortages in some regions. This isn't likely a reference to the US, as the Switch 2 has been readily available for purchase. But shortages are annoying and frustrating for anyone who had to endure them, and Nintendo promised it's making efforts to meet the demand going forward.

"The system is already in the hands of man
title: Switch 2 Demand Has Exceeded Expectations, Nintendo Apologizes For Global Shortages

description:
The legal battle between Google and Epic Games goes back to 2020, when the former pulled Fortnite from the Play Store over billing disputes. Since then, the two tech titans have decked it out in various courtrooms. But now, the two sides have apparently reached a settlement, pending the approval of the court.

Google's president of Android ecosystem, Sameer Samat, shared the announcement online and touted "a proposed set of changes to Android and Google Play that focus on expanding developer choice and flexibility, lowering fees, and encouraging more competition all while keeping users safe."

Exciting news! Together with Ep
title: Epic Games And Google Reach Legal Settlement After Years Of Court Battles

description:
World of Warcraft's Midnight expansion is making major changes to simplify classes and eliminate the need for player-made mods, but it's not because a console version is in the works.

That's according to WoW senior game director Ion Hazzikostas in a new interview with the Unshackled Fury podcast, where Hazzikostas tried to put recent rumors about a console port to bed.

"To be fully transparent, there's no reason for us to hide anything about this," Hazzikostas said. "If we were actively working towards bringing WoW to consoles, or a bunch of other platforms, we'd be saying, 'We're actively working towards it, we know we have a lot of work to do but it's a place where we want to land.'"
title: WoW Isn't Coming To Consoles, Game Director Says: "No Reason For Us To Hide Anything About This"
James Islington's Hierarchy Series: Save 30% On The Strength Of The Few Preorder

description:
We're just a few months shy of Valve's Steam Deck turning four years old, but the Steam owner doesn't look like it's going to wind down support any time soon. In fact, it might be listening to feedback more than ever, as one of the most requested features for the handheld gaming PC is finally being added soon.

One of the weirdest quirks with the Steam Deck is the requirement to have the handheld's display on to download games. You weren't able to put the PC into sleep mode to conserve battery while downloading a new game, which is especially irritating for large downloads and those using the burn-in prone Steam Deck OLED. Valve seemingly has finally acknowledged that this is silly, and has introduced the ability to download games in a new power-saving mode in a new Steam Deck update.

Available in preview before going live to all Steam Deck users, the new mode is automatically enabled w
title: One Of The Most Requested Steam Deck Features Is Finally Being Patched In

description:
There is now an easier way to find sales and download games for Switch and Switch 2 on your mobile device. Nintendo has released the Nintendo Store app for iOS and Android, and one of the coolest features relates to play activity. Using this new app allows you to see how long you spent in games dating back to the 3DS era.

Other features of the Nintendo Store app include seeing the latest news from the company and viewing My Nintendo rewards. However, none of the actual purchases happen in-app, as you'll be taken to the website page to actually buy a Switch game or Switch 2 upgrade pack, for instance.
title: Nintendo Store App Released On Mobile, Shows Your Play Activity Dating Back To 3DS
Shovel Knight Is Getting An Expanded Art Book Next Year

description:
The Switch 2 is already the fastest-selling Nintendo hardware to date, and data coming directly from the company indicates that most Switch 2 owners also owned a Switch 1.

In Nintendo's latest earnings briefing, the company revealed that 84% of Switch 2 owners were Switch 1 players who made the jump to the new hardware. The figure is based on Nintendo's data as of September 30.

"This high percentage shows that many consumers who enjoyed Nintendo Switch are smoothly transitioning to Nintendo Switch 2, allowing us to maintain our relationships with them across platform generations," read Nintendo's report.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: A Vast Majority Of Nintendo Switch 2 Owners Transitioned From Switch 1

description:
Big business.


A Scene From Illumination's The Super Mario Bros. Movie

2025 kicked off with the next big video game movie--A Minecraft Movie. It was a huge success, making more than $950 million, cementing its position as the No. 2 highest-grossing video game movie of all time.

It was not the first video game adaptation from Hollywood and won't be the last. But where does A Minecraft Movie rank all-time against biggest video game movies? In this gallery, we're rounding up the highest-grossing video game films of all time, breaking down box office results by domestic, international, and worldwide figures.

The top 10 list is made up of massive franchises like Pokemon, Tomb Raider, Angry Birds, and Sonic, just to name a few. Looking ahead, there are a boatload of new video game films in the works.<
title: Top 15 Highest-Grossing Video Game Movies Of All Time

description:
PlayStation Portal owners can now stream their games from the cloud, Sony has announced. After rolling out a beta version last year, the updated version of Cloud Streaming will allow PS Plus Premium members to play a massively expanded selection of games on the device, and it won't require them to connect to a PS5 console through Remote Play.

At the time of writing, there are 2,845 games that support PS Portal Cloud Streaming. This includes several of Sony's biggest first-party titles like Ghost of Yotei and Astro Bot, alongside third-party titles like Borderlands 4 and Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth. Games from the PS Plus Game Catalog and Classics Catalog are compatible as well, and Sony has introduced a new home screen that features three tabs to help distinguish between the various
title: PS Portal Update Adds Full Cloud Streaming Two Years After Launch

description:
A new trailer for Five Nights at Freddy's 2 has arrived, and it's pretty spooky. The sequel to the 2023 film based on the popular game takes place one year after the events of the first movie.

"Former security guard Mike (Josh Hutcherson) and police officer Vanessa (Elizabeth Lail) have kept the truth from Mike's 11-year-old sister, Abby (Piper Rubio), concerning the fate of her animatronic friends," reads a line from the film's description. "But when Abby sneaks out to reconnect with Freddy, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy, it will set into motion a terrifying series of events, revealing dark secrets about the true origin of Freddy's, and unleashing a long-forgotten horror hidden away for decades."
title: New Five Nights At Freddy's 2 Trailer Is Very Scary

description:
Steam's best-seller chart last week was packed with big launches and returning favorites, led by Arc Raiders, which stormed into the number-one spot. The new sci-fi shooter made a huge splash right out of the gate, beating out heavy hitters like Battlefield 6 and the free-to-play Counter-Strike 2. The Outer Worlds 2 reached its all-time peak and indie hits such as create-your-own-superhero-adventure stylized Dispatch, showing there's plenty of variety in what's grabbing attention on PC right now.

Even the Steam Deck hardware remained a top seller, while B
title: Top 10 Best-Selling Games On Steam Last Week

description:
Nintendo enjoyed enormous success with 2023's The Super Mario Bros. Movie, so it was no surprise to learn that Nintendo quickly got to work on a sequel, The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, with a live-action Zelda movie also in the works. Now, Nintendo has teased even more Nintendo movies may be on the way, while the company has also outlined its general philosophy for movies going forward.

As part of Nintendo's latest earnings briefing, the company said it was working to build a "framework for a consistent release cadence" for films based on its properties. This includes The Super Mario Galaxy Movie in 2026, the live-action Zelda movie in 2027, and more films to come after.

"We are continuing to prepare for the ongoing release of movies in the future," Nintendo said. None were named outright, but it was previously suggested that a
title: Nintendo Wants A Steady Release Of New Movies
